page.title: 06FAMILY LIFE
page.content:
Pupils undertook the work with enthusiasm .5th-20th June
Problems arose when we could only visit on Wednesday and Thursday- that is of course the day the Tesco Bus visits Ansley so most people were out shopping- taking advantage of the free bus service. Villagers were most helpful and answered questions willingly.Some were prepared to chat for a long time whilst others gave the brief information requested and then went about their business.The second visit was more difficult because other groups had also been asking questions and the villagers were beginning to lose patience with the interviewers, if they had been questioned more than once.
